charges.charge_description: 18:1153, 113(a)(6) CIR - Assault Resulting in Serious Bodily Injury(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for a term of SIXTY SEVEN (67) MONTHS on Counts Three and One, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS on Counts One and Three, said counts to run concurrently. S/A: $200.00;9/24/2014 Revoke Supervised Release. BOP for a term of 8 Months served concurrently to term imposed in CR 13-343-01-PHX-DGC. No term of supervised release to follow

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for a term of SIXTY SEVEN (67) MONTHS on Counts Three and One, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS on Counts One and Three, said counts to run concurrently. S/A: $200.009/24/2014 Revoke Supervised Release. BOP for a term of 8 Months served concurrently to term imposed in CR 13-343-01-PHX-DGC. No term of supervised release to follow
